author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a theoretical bug in the ra-serf get-mergeinfo implementation.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/mergeinfo.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_mergeinfo): Fix this to use the new
svn_ra_serf__get_baseline_info() helper, which accurately handle the
case where the peg revision is SVN_INVALID_REVNUM.

author: cmpilato
msg: Abstract out some code needed in multiple places.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/ra_serf.h,
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/property.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_baseline_info): New helper function.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/log.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_log): Use new helper function.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make the ra-neon implementation of the get-location-segments API work!
* subversion/libsvn_ra_neon/fetch.c
(svn_ra_neon__get_location_segments): Put the right closing tag on
the REPORT request body.  While here, fix a little comment, too.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/constructors.c
(svn_location_segment_dup): Rework for consistency with neighboring funcs.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a SEGFAULT in the mod_dav_svn get-location-segments REPORT response.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/reports/get-location-segments.c
(location_segment_receiver): Er... put the parsed revision values
into the variables set aside for them.
